node.doctext:
Admit it. You find [ecstacy] in the precise arrangement of letters upon a board and moan in delight when you get that [triple word score]. You get [the shakes] when you skip your daily [crossword puzzle]. You've been known to [anagram|rearrange letters] aloud in your sleep. And as much as you deny it, you revel in the [guilty pleasure] of [bad pun|bad puns] gone wild.

So do yourself a favor. Join our letter-hugging [usergroup], and be prepared for invitations to late-night games of Yahoo [Literati] full of noderful fun.

You know you want to. Just message our [reviled|revered] groupleader [machfive] and say, "Add my ass to the wordsmiths usergroup!"
